mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT FROM author WHERE id = #{id})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT FROM book WHERE authorid = #{id} AND deleted = false)
SELECT id, name FROM author WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book WHERE authorid = #{id}

SELECT b.id, b."name", b.price, b.publishedyear, b.quantitycurrent, b.quantitysold, b.deleted, b.authorid, b.publisherid FROM book b JOIN author a ON b.authorid = a.id WHERE a.id = #{id} ORDER BY quantitysold DESC OFFSET 0 LIMIT 3
